title: Undeclared Advising Information  · Angelo State University
description: Discover academic advising resources at Angelo State to help undeclared students explore majors, set goals, and find their best academic path for success.

headings: Mathematics, Engineering, Physical Sciences and Technology Exploratory Track
Life Sciences and Health Professions Exploratory Track
Social and Behavioral Sciences Exploratory Track
paragraphs: Students that choose Undeclared are required to select an Exploratory Track. This will help you discover your interests and options with the goal of declaring a major by the time you complete 30 credit hours.
Please refer to the list below for more information about each track. Need help choosing a track? Contact the Undeclared Advisor.
Is this track right for you?
If you answered yes to any of these questions,view a list of arts and humanities course recommendations, majors and pre-professional programs.
Is this track right for you?
If you answered yes to any of these questions,view a list of business course recommendations, majors and pre-professional programs.
Is this track right for you?
If you answered yes to any of these questions,view a list of education course recommendations, majors and pre-professional programs.
Is this track right for you?
If you answered yes to any of these questions,view a list of math, engineering, physical sciences and tech course recommendations, majors and pre-professional programs.
Is this track right for you?
If you answered yes to any of these questions,view a list of life sciences and health professions course recommendations, majors and pre-professional programs.
Is this track right for you?
If you answered yes to any of these questions,view a list of social and behavioral sciences course recommendations, majors and pre-professional programs.
Undeclared Advisorsare available 8 a.m. - 5 p.m., Monday-Friday, in Room 302 of thePorter Henderson Library.
